name: Transition
description:
Little creature is sad, because he does not know the meaning of his life. But one day, the magic come. You must help him to get to the platform in the same color. But you must pay attention to the time and the black platforms, because the game will end.

The game was created on Bratislava Game Jam 2016 and game won in category Attendee Choice.

The theme of this event was the "transition" same as name of game.

In the game are different transitions like:

- depression is replaced by hope,

- music intensifies,

- background and environment is changing,

- also character and difficulty of game.

To conclude, you will be feeling the magic of Christmas and the sad being will change to... and that is your story.

Music:

Grand Beats
